name: Kwark
description:
Kwark is a single-player game in which you are a creature called Kwark - a white cylindrical sphere with a head attached.
Your main task is to complete all levels, but it is not as easy as it seems!
Many levels available to complete, changing skins when completing a difficult level and a well-made menu will not let you get bored.
Kwark has a large functionality of settings, such as: full-screen mode, choice of game graphics, sound settings and much more will not let you get bored in the game!
Kwark can run, jump, crouch, squat walk, and squat jump.
The game has a menu with a large number of buttons such as: “Play”, “Menu”, “Settings”.
And localization between Russian and English will allow you to play the way you are comfortable.
Can you complete all the levels?
